title: Please help me boost this vid

embed.description: This poor little wild Koala was so thirsty and drank a whole bottle of water!

body:
Hi guys, It's only 20 seconds long. I'm really trying to make this go viral. Please help by giving it a like on youtube and if you're feeling extra generous, share it on facebook  :)

Love you long time

replies.body:
Ummmm THIS MUST BE ANIMATION
Koalas don't drink that much water. Some drink a little bit a day and some drink NONE.

Jeez. So lucky that drop bear wasn't in a tree, so fucked if it was. Without the element of surprise and the ability too drop they are harmless and cannot prey on their food.

Look up and stay alive.

http://images.travelpod.com/users/bridie-josie/1.1262820613.drop-bears.jpg
lol, would ;love it if you left that comment on the video. and a like :)
